top_comments.comment: Gigi , you have made a new standard for this song! Connecting the peace and the pain. Powerful and timeless.
What I like with this girl is that when she sings , she makes it her very own by showing her own style and talent.... Terrible ....I'm getting crazy with your style of singing
4:45 and ended with a winner smile!!! RIP replay button

comments_since_last_sample.body: Love her voice. Filipino singers are so good in singing. She has an incredible voice, she's a great, brilliant singer & beautiful. She's soulful, her diction is good, her high notes are always on point, she never misses. Her low notes are smooth & beautiful too. With her wide range she can sing at an international level like Charice.
